EmailTemplate.name: Sept 2015 survey reminder
EmailTemplate.subject: Your feedback on this year's Live Different program?
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Contact.FirstName},
Thank you for hosting our Live Different team at {!Account.Name} recently! I was getting in touch with some schools we have been at recently, and noticed we haven't received your feedback survey that we sent to you shortly after the presentation. It is very helpful, especially at the beginning of the school year, to get feedback on our presentation and supplementary resources. If you would be able to take couple of minutes to fill this out, it would be a big help to us and is greatly appreciated!
Here is the survey link: http://www.tfaforms.com/forms/view/238599?tfa_177={!Opportunity.Contact_SurveyId__c}&tfa_178={!Opportunity.Id}&tfa_179={!Opportunity.AccountId}&tfa_x={!Opportunity.OwnerId}&tfa_277={!Opportunity.Account}&tfa_279={!Opportunity.Class__c}
Thank you so much for your help and advice towards improving the work we do in schools.
Kind Regards,
Ryan Wood
